name: PxTone Composer Project
summary: A PTCOP file is a project created by Pixel PxTone, also known as "PxTone Collage," a music composition tool designed for creating chiptune-style music. It stores audio tracks, instruments, note sequences, timing information, and settings in the proprietary PxTone Composer Project (PTCOP) format. After saving their music compositions as PTCOP files, PxTone users can close and re-open the projects to continue editing.
